title: Ginga Tetsudou 999: Kimi wa Haha no You ni Aiseru ka!!
alternative_title: Galaxy Express 999: Can You Love Like a Mother?!!, Ginga Tetsudo 999: Kimi wa Haha no You ni Aiseru ka!!, Ginga Tetsudou 999: Kimi wa Haha no You ni Aiseruka!!, 銀河鉄道９９９　君は母のように愛せるか！！
description: A remake of episodes 51-52 of the TV version.
